BNC User Reference Guide

<note>

note contains a note or annotation.
Class model.divPart att.placement
Declaration 
element note { attribute place { text }?, attribute n { text }?, s+ }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes and those inherited from [att.placement ] )
place specifies where the note is placed in the original source.
Status: Optional
Values are:
FOOT footnote.
SIDE side note.
END endnote.
n internal identifier.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) text
Example
 <note place="SIDE"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <s n="477">
   <w c5="AT0" hw="the" pos="ART">The </w>
   <w c5="AJ0-NN1" hw="short" pos="ADJ">short </w>
   <w c5="VBZ" hw="be" pos="VERB">is </w>
   <w c5="AT0" hw="a" pos="ART">a </w>
   <w c5="NN1" hw="film" pos="SUBST">film </w>
   <w c5="PRP" hw="about" pos="PREP">about </w>
   <w c5="NN1-VVG" hw="sailing" pos="SUBST">sailing</w>
   <c c5="PUN">.</c>
  </s>...</note>
; ; ;
Module core
